title: Jessie Buckley, Cillian Murphy and Daniel Day-Lewis Nominated for Irish Academy Awards
summary: Two years after he won best actor at the 2024 Irish Film & TV Academy (IFTA) awards, the final stop on what proved to be complete awards season domination for “Oppenheimer,” Cillian Murphy is back in the mix on home soil for “Steve.” The Irish actor is among a number of major names with 2026 […]

title: Many high-capacity NVMe SSDs are now as expensive as gold by weight as shortage intensifies — we ran the numbers, here's what we found
summary: High-capacity NVMe SSDs are quickly becoming pricier than their gold weight
